aima.core.environment.tictactoe

Class TicTacToeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.environment.tictactoe.TicTacToeGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game<TicTacToeState,XYLocation,java.lang.String>

    public class TicTacToeGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game<TicTacToeState,XYLocation,java.lang.String>
    Provides an implementation of the Tic-tac-toe game which can be used for experiments with the Minimax algorithm.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
